DataElement.preferredName: Inotuzumab Ozogamicin Per Cycle Combination Dose Administered 1 Decimal Place Milligram per Square Meter Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The 1 decimal place milligram per square meter numeric combined dose per cycle value measured, assigned or computed related to the inotuzumab ozogamicin administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Inotuzumab Ozogamicin Per Cycle Combination Dose Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A CD22-targeted cytotoxic immunoconjugate composed of a humanized IgG4 anti-CD22 antibody covalently linked to N-acetyl-gamma-calicheamicin dimethyl hydrazide (CalichDMH) with potential antineoplastic activity. Inotuzumab ozogamicin is rapidly internalized upon binding of the antibody moiety to B cell-specific CD22 receptors, delivering the conjugated CalichDMH intracellularly; the CalichDMH moiety binds to the minor groove of DNA in a sequence-specific manner, resulting in double-strand DNA breaks and apoptosis. CalichDMH is a derivative of gamma calicheamicin, a cytotoxic antibiotic produced by the bacterium Micromonospora echinospora._For each, generally denoting a ratio._An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence._A collection of things that have been assembled together to form a new whole._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredName: Inotuzumab Ozogamicin Per Cycle Combination Dose

Inotuzumab ozogamicin is rapidly internalized upon binding of the antibody moiety to B cell-specific CD22 receptors, delivering the conjugated CalichDMH intracellularly; the CalichDMH moiety binds to the minor groove of DNA in a sequence-specific manner, resulting in double-strand DNA breaks and apoptosis. CalichDMH is a derivative of gamma calicheamicin, a cytotoxic antibiotic produced by the bacterium Micromonospora echinospora.:For each, generally denoting a ratio.:An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.:A collection of things that have been assembled together to form a new whole.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Concepts.definition: A CD22-targeted cytotoxic immunoconjugate composed of a humanized IgG4 anti-CD22 antibody covalently linked to N-acetyl-gamma-calicheamicin dimethyl hydrazide (CalichDMH) with potential antineoplastic activity. Inotuzumab ozogamicin is rapidly internalized upon binding of the antibody moiety to B cell-specific CD22 receptors, delivering the conjugated CalichDMH intracellularly; the CalichDMH moiety binds to the minor groove of DNA in a sequence-specific manner, resulting in double-strand DNA breaks and apoptosis. CalichDMH is a derivative of gamma calicheamicin, a cytotoxic antibiotic produced by the bacterium Micromonospora echinospora.
For each, generally denoting a ratio.
An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.
A collection of things that have been assembled together to form a new whole.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ValueDomain.preferredName: 1 Decimal Place Milligram per Square Meter Value
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1_An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers._A metric unit of areal density equal to approximately 2.94935E-5 ounce per square yard. Also used as a dose calculation unit._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.
A metric unit of areal density equal to approximately 2.94935E-5 ounce per square yard. Also used as a dose calculation unit.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
